channel.title: Posts on Not Just a Statistic
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Not Just a Statistic

item.title: Introduction to Texas Hold'em
item.description: #, include = FALSE} # library(ggplot2) # Location if (any(grepl("post_topics", list.files()))) { pathtofile <- "post_topics/TexasHoldEm/Work/results" } else { pathtofile <- "Work/results" } load(sprintf("%s/2020-01-TexasHoldem-Analysis-pt1.Rdata", pathtofile)) Poker! I Barely Know her! I recently listened to a story on the podcast for Moth Radio Hour. The speaker, Annie Duke, described how she came to be in a high stakes game of Texas Hold’em with nine of the other world’s best poker players. If you aren’t familiar with the Texas Hold’em, you can find a nice summary of the game and its rules here.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: The Idea. Welcome to my first blog entry! I was going to do a quick introduction followed by an equally quick mini-analysis but then I started doing said analysis and it kept getting bigger and bigger as I thought of more things to add and explore… instead I am just writing this introduction and doing the fun stuff elsewhere. So, the quick rundown is this: I hope to use this blog to share my passion for data science and share with others the way I approach data science.
